text: University of Cartagena is a university in Cartagena, Colombia. It was established in 1827. It is a public, departmental, coeducational, research university. Its motto is Siempre a la altura de los tiempos. Nobel Prize- winning author Gabriel García Márquez attended the university. title: University of Cartagena
